reviews.text: Ok, I have read some of the previous reviews, and it is true this is not the Hilton or Marriott, however for US$35 a night what do you expect??!!
reviews.title: Cheap, convenient place to stay

likes.liked: — Location, cheap place to stay in an expensive city
likes.disliked: — Some things need improving it is quite old and outdated.

reviews.text: My friend and I stayed here based on the price and location. We didnt want to spend $100's on accomm. as there is plenty of great things to see and do, and spend your dollars on, in NYC and the Chelsea Inrternational was a perfect base.
reviews.title: Very disappointed
Good hostel
reviews.text: My friend and I stayed in a 6 room female dorm with ensuite. Our room faced on the court yard, and whilst they stop other guests from talking and hanging out in the courtyard after 11pm, you will still find people on their doorstep chatting until all hours. It can get quite noisy. However, take some ear plugs and you will be fine.

reviews.title: Got no sleep
reviews.text: The rooms are older, and the lock on the bathroom did not work properly, but this place has charm and character. The beds are also older and a bit squeaky with linen (pillow, sheets and blanket) are provided. the linen may not be the cleanest, so you may prefer to take your own.
It is in a great location, and close to the subway and some good bars/restaurants.
reviews.title: A place to shower and sleep!

reviews.text: This was my first time travelling alone, but I wanted to stay somewhere reasonably priced - found this hostel's website, and all looked OK. Used their online reservations, and booked a PRIVATE room for 5 nights. Found another lone traveller, who also booked a private room (independent bookings). We arrived there together, at about 10.30pm, night before St Patrick's Day, to find that although they still had a record of each of our bookings, neither were for a private room! Staff were very not at all helpful or apologetic for their mistake, just said "ah well, must have entered it in the computer incorrectly". Of course, there were no private rooms left, so it was back to the streets for us. All of this after a 24 hour flight was not acceptable. I can't speak of the quality of the hostel - but on first impressions, I would NEVER even consider staying here again.
reviews.title: Lost two separate bookings!
